attributes.action: Less Police Involvement in Drug Treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I work in the drug treatment field and alot of the work i do is controlled by ex-police officers who,s only experience of drug users is arresting them. i would like to see more drug treatment workers advising government on drugs and drug policy. This is an issue where no person of authority will make any headway. drugs are a socail issue not criminal!
